text: Art Is... is a 1971 American short documentary film directed by Julian Krainin. It was nominated for an Academy Award for Best Documentary Short. ==See also== * List of American films of 1971 ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1971 films Category:1971 documentary films Category:1971 short films Category:American films Category:American documentary films Category:American independent films Category:English-language films Category:Short documentary films
title: Art Is...
